value.title: Fast-Tracking AI Ethics Is Dicey And Shortsighted, Especially For Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: There seems to be quite a rush to get AI systems out-the-door these days. Unfortunately, there is a devilish price to be paid in such a rush to judgment and the associated misguided assumption that the soonest AI is the best kind of AI.

value.title: AI Has Resulted In “Ethical Issues” For 90% Of Businesses
value.excerpt: A new report from Capgemini has revealed that 90% of organizations are aware of at least one instance where an AI system had resulted in ethical issues for their business. value.title: When AI in healthcare goes wrong, who is responsible?
